brief_title: Study of Aripiprazole in Patients With Bipolar I Disorder With a Major Depression Episode
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate flexible doses (5-30mg) of aripiprazole versus placebo in patients with bipolar depression.
description: Tablets, Oral, 10mg (2 5mg tablets), Once daily, 8 weeks.
Tablets, Oral, 0 mg, Once daily, 8 weeks.
criteria: - ages 18-65 - Men and women, who have experienced a prior manic episode that required hospitalization, and now meet criteria for a major depressive episode.
